org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.providers
Interface IAeProcessStateConnectionProvider

All Superinterfaces:
IAeStorageProvider
All Known Implementing Classes:
AeSQLProcessStateConnectionProvider, AeXMLDBProcessStateConnectionProvider
public interface IAeProcessStateConnectionProvider
extends IAeStorageProvider

A process state connection delegate. This interface defines methods that the delegating process state connection storage will call in order to store/read date in the underlying database.
